3rd Party Memory Boards  

 

  

 

 

 

Austin Franklin 32K RAM Board Front

Austin Franklin 32K RAM Board Back

 

This is another product sold by Austin Franklin. A 32K RAM board that can be installed into Slots 1 through 3 in the 800.  It was produced to allow users to be able to install an Austin Franklin 80 (AF80) video card into Slot #3 and still be able to have up to 48K of RAM in their system but substituting a 16K card in Slot #2 for their 32K RAM board.

 

If you have the manual for this product, please contact Curt so that we can discuss having it added on the page for others to download and  access.   CLICK HERE
